Anyone wanna help me with a printer ques: I want to print something out in black.  My color cartridge is empty and I get a message that the printer is not connected - probably for the color cartridge problem.  What can I do to print in black?

once you hit print, the print dialogue that comes up usually has an option section for your printer. you can choose black and white usually. If it's an image, you can open it and remove all the color with an image editor
